registry.manakit-major-version-is-here: New version Manakit is here! Discover v{{version}} changelog

introduction.title: Manakit is a Svelte component library
introduction.content: Imagine, Create and Develop your Svelte web application with Manakit. Manakit has several customizable components to allow you to quickly build your projects. Manakit lets you focus on functionality and simplifies the creation of modules. Manakit is optimized for your Svelte projects with Vite.js and/or Typescript.

magic.title: Manakit is magic
magic.introduction: Manakit is a new Svelte Component Library build from scratch on Typescript for create your web application.

list.customizable: Customizable. Manakit offers the possibility of deeply adapting Manakit to your project with the management of themes, colors, breakpoints and pre-built components.
list.svelte: Svelte. Manakit is developed on Svelte. It ensures perfect compatibility with your slim application. Manakit has no other dependencies on libraries (for example Bootstrap or Tailwind).
list.simple: Simple. Manakit is based solely on native HTML elements to ensure easy and quick handling without limiting the customization possibilities.
list.vary: Vary. Manakit offers a wide range of components to allow you to design complex and optimized interfaces

magic.content: Manakit is designed to work 100% with Svelte.  Developed in Svelte.js and Typescript, it ensures complete operability with the APIs offered by the Svelte framework. The aim of Manakit is to offer complete and customizable components to design web applications in a simple and effective way.

preview.title: Why make it complicated when you can make it simple?
preview.content: Install Manakit with {{command}} and off you go

is-best.title: Manakit is your personalized Svelte component kit
is-best.content: Manakit stands out from other Svelte component libraries by its lightness and above all its simplicity. It is based solely on Svelte and Vite.js.
is-best.mentions-release: Based on release publication over a period of one year

starting.title: We begin ?
starting.content: Install Manakit and embark on the adventure

styles.title: Style
styles.description: Predefined classes to simplify your UI

community.title: Join the community
community.content: Find the team that develops Manakit as well as its community. Share your projects, find support and actively contribute to the evolution of Manakit.
